name: The Walking Dead: Michonne
summary:
Telltale Games has revealed that the first episode of Mouse over video for audio The Walking Dead: Michonne standalone series will release on February 23rd for the Xbox One and Xbox 360. Titled "In Too Deep," the premiere episode follows Michonne and Pete as they sail along the coast looking for survivors and supplies. After discovering a horrific massacre, their journey takes them to the floating colony of Monroe, where the person responsible may be residing. 

The miniseries will contain a total of three episodes. The second episode, "Give No Shelter," is set to release in March, and the third episode, "What We Deserve," will follow suit and release in April. The entire miniseries will cost $14.99.
